dct_title_s: Geographical and historical Maps, illustrative of sacred history
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "British miles", "Toises", "Hebrew cubits", and "Jewish stadii".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text: Description of the land of Canaan...
2 inset maps: Form of the camp of the Israelites -- Plan of the city of Jeruselem.
